div.p: Search Engine Plugin is designed and developed to plugin Apache Solr Search like functionlity into any Web Container like Tomcat, Jetty, etc. In general, Apache Solr Server runs on Jetty on the port 8983. To integrate this functionality to any web application needs to make indirect calls to the Apache Solr Server which runs on 8983. For this Apache SolrJ Client is involved which increses the space as well the time complexity. To remove this kind of bottlneck, direct Solr connection can be readily available for no need for Apache Solr Server. It is done on any web server just by deploy solr.war in which seplugin.jar library is embedded. This library basically provides two kind of handlers viz. gethandler and posthandler as well as an XMLWriter which represents Convertors Pojo.
